jobs_description.title: Web Frontend Developer
jobs_description.description: I create modern websites with good UI/UX practices. I also manage SEO, security and performance optimizations to increase conversion and visits.

projects.title: Portafolio UX Ana Rangel
projects.description: Together with a community of programmers from many parts of Latin America. I was part of the development of a website that is the portfolio of a girl named Ana Rangel who is a UX designer and Streamer.

projects.title: Calculadora Payoneer Nicaragua
projects.description: Discover an essential tool for freelancers and businesses in Nicaragua. Our Calculadora Payoneer Nicaragua allows you to calculate precisely and quickly the rates and commissions when receiving international payments through Payoneer. Start using it today and take control of your finances!

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a Midudev and ManzDev mod but I'm happier being an AnaRangel mod
about.description: Front-end developer and Systems Engineering student with great interest in technology and collaboration in open source projects. My expertise is in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React and TypeScript. Although I am relatively new to the industry, my enthusiasm and dedication drive me to constantly learn and grow. I am always open to new opportunities.
